actions: Clears Heat, expels Phlegm, expels pus and moistens the Lungs.
Tonifies the Middle Jiao and augments Qi.
With Fu Ling, for Spleen and Stomach Deficiency with fatigue, a sensation of fullness in the abdomen, dizziness, lethargy, shortness of breath, anorexia and loose stools or diarrhea.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, clears Heat and soothes irritability.
Strengthens the Spleen, harmonizes the Middle Jiao and transforms Phlegm.
Reduces Food Stagnation, promotes digestion, strengthens, opens the Stomach, harmonizes the Center, strengthens the Spleen and encourages appetite.
Clears Summerheat, harmonizes the Middle Jiao, calms restless fetus and treats diarrhea and dysentery with Blood and mucus.
Transforms turbid Dampness, harmonizes the Middle Jiao, awakens the Spleen and promotes the movement of Qi.
Regulates Qi, adjusts the Middle, relieves the diaphragm, dries Dampness, transforms Phlegm and descends Qi.
Clears Heat, drains Dampness, drains Fire, resolves toxicity and drains Stomach Fire.

symptoms: Inability to take in any food or fluid without nausea and vomiting
A small or decreasing amount of diarrhea with mucus
There may or may not be small amounts of Blood in the stool
A foul taste in the mouth

modifications.purpose: prolonged vomiting which damages the Stomach Yin
